sentences.en: As a matter of fact, Blog is the abbreviation of Webblog.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 博客这个词是网络日志的缩写.

sentences.en: Before BLOG. OMY started, there are times i go to visit XiaXue and JackNeo's blog.
sentences.cn: 在BLOG. OMY开始 之前, 我有时会去下雪,还是梁志强的日志网页,看一看.

sentences.en: Bilingual Time: When did you start this blog and what for?
sentences.cn: 双语时代: 您什么时候开始开设这个博客?目的是什么?

sentences.en: BLOG contrast, such as mature virtual communities, online games community is still " the initial stage. "
sentences.cn: 对比BLOG等 成熟虚拟社区, 网游社区仍属 “ 初级阶段 ”.

sentences.en: BTW , all entries on this blog will be deleted on this Jul.
sentences.cn: 附记, 这个网志的所有旧文章将在七月(转移满半年)全部删除.

sentences.en: Does Blog Design Matter in an Age of Feed Readers?
sentences.cn: Feed充斥的年代blog设计还重要 吗 ?

sentences.en: His new wave BLOG inside, the topic much relate to train.
sentences.cn: 他的新浪BLOG里, 主题多与火车有关.

sentences.en: How can I generate traffic to my blog?
sentences.cn: 我怎么提高我的blog访问量 呢 ?

sentences.en: I shall however , announce this blog in my fans'sites.
sentences.cn: 我会把这个blog向歌迷宣布.

sentences.en: I shall however , announce this blog in my fans'sites. It's been a while folks.
sentences.cn: 我会把这个blog向歌迷宣布. 有一阵子没跟大家打招呼了.

sentences.en: Inside some BLOG , I saw are very many about the stock , forecasts about the stock market.
sentences.cn: 在一些BLOG里面, 我看到很多于股票的, 于大的.

sentences.en: Michelle searched Derrick's name online and found his blog.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔在网上搜索他的名字并且找到了他的博客.

sentences.en: There is also the ever popular blog add ins.
sentences.cn: 还有以往任何时候都受欢迎的博客地址集.

sentences.en: What may also estimate, the scientific instrument may manufacture own data blog.
sentences.cn: 还可预计的是, 科学仪器可制作自己的数据博客.

sentences.en: When Barbieux started his blog, his aspirations were small; he simply hoped to communicate with a few people.
sentences.cn: 当巴布开始他的博客时，他的期望并不大。他只是希望能与几个人交流。

sentences.en: Zeng's blog admired by many women who are also overweight.
sentences.cn: 曾的博客受到了许许多多同样有超标体重困扰的女孩们的追捧.

trans.tran_en: a web page containing information or opinions from a particular person or about a particular subject, to which new information is added regularly
